content:
<rule id="mvc-01210" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller">
                    <location>ANNOTATION</location>
                </javaclass>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring MVC">
                    <description>The application embeds a Spring MVC library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring MVC</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
